sentences.english: Pinghu oil and gas field is the first oil and gas field in East China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 平湖油氣田是東海海域第一個投入開發的油氣田。

sentences.english: Pinghu oil and gas field is the first oil and gas field in East China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 平湖油氣田是東海海域第一個投入開發的油氣田。

sentences.english: Artificial rock is absolutely necessary for exploitation research in oil - field.
sentences.chinese: 人工巖樣是油氣田開採研究中必不可少的用品。

sentences.english: The equipment will be used for recompression and export services at the new oil and gas field.
sentences.chinese: 這些設備將用於在新油氣田的再壓縮和輸出服務。

sentences.english: The total numbers of oil-gas fields in a petroliferous basin are calculated by means of Weibull method.
sentences.chinese: 用維布爾分佈法逼近含油氣盆地中油氣田的總數量。

sentences.english: Banqiao buried hill is located in the deep zone of Bannan fault block in Banqiao oil field.
sentences.chinese: 板橋古潛山位於板橋油氣田板南斷塊深層。

sentences.english: Such technology has been applied first in offshore oil and gas development in China.
sentences.chinese: 無基盤鑽井技術在我國海上油氣田開發中屬首次應用。

sentences.english: China has complete sovereign rights and jurisdiction over the Chunxiao Oil and Gas Field.
sentences.chinese: 中方對春曉油氣田擁有完全的主權權利和管轄權。

sentences.english: This result is significant to the reasonable development for Banqiao oil and gas fields.
sentences.chinese: 其結果對合理開發板橋的油氣田具有很重要的意義。

sentences.english: The oil-gas fields with abnormal high pressure account for about 30 percent of the total fields.
sentences.chinese: 異常高壓油氣田約佔全球油氣田的30%左右。

sentences.english: The oil-gas fields with abnormal high pressure account for about 30 percent of the total fields.
sentences.chinese: 異常高壓油氣田約佔全球油氣田的30%左右。

sentences.english: Analysis of production decline rate is an important item in development planning of oil -gas fields.
sentences.chinese: 油氣田產量遞減率分析是開發規劃中的一項重要內容。

sentences.english: The reservoir anisotropy has an important effect on the oil-gas fields exploration and development.
sentences.chinese: 儲層非均質性對油氣田的勘探和開發效果影響很大。

sentences.english: It is also selling some mature oil and gas fields in the North Sea and Nigeria.
sentences.chinese: 該公司還將出售在北海和尼日利亞的部分成熟油氣田。

sentences.english: Wenliu Oilfield is a super giant oil-gas field.
sentences.chinese: 文留油田是一個特大型油氣田。

sentences.english: The bevel milling cutter for cutting groove of oil casing - pipes was designed.
sentences.chinese: 設計了用於油氣田管道坡口切割的角度銑刀。
